 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיק‎</span>] verb ==mock, deride== (Aramaic Pa\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיֵּיק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and Aph\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמֵיק‎</span>); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural (probably Hiph\`il) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִ֫יקוּ‎</span> [[Ps.73.8|Ps 73:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִידַבְּרוּ בְּרָע‎</span>). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺקֵד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺקְדָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקד‎</span>.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺקֵשׁ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקשׁ‎</span>.
